last_episode_to_air.name: First Date Flashbacks
last_episode_to_air.overview: The experience comes to an explosive, emotional conclusion. So, whose story has a happy ending? Who'll end up heartbroken? And most importantly - who's Hannah?

name: Love Triangle
overview: From the Producers of MARRIED AT FIRST SIGHT, LOVE TRIANGLE challenges a group of singles to relinquish their grasp on what they think their perfect partner should look like, and instead choose someone, sight unseen, based on a deeper connection.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Love Triangle challenges a group of singles to relinquish their grasp on what they think their perfect partner should look like, and instead choose someone, sight unseen, based on a deeper connection.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Love Triangle challenges a group of singles to relinquish their grasp on what they think their perfect partner should look like, and instead choose someone, sight unseen, based on a deeper connection.

episodes.name: Balls Deep
episodes.overview: Three bold singles commit to a radical dating experience by choosing a new partner after texting for just three days, without any idea what the person on the other end of the phone looks like - until they show up IRL at an epic blind date.

episodes.name: Red Flag
episodes.overview: Three more singles join the Love Triangle experience. They've each been matched with two potential love interests and will choose one, sight unseen, based on three days of texting. They'll meet on a blind date before moving in together one day later.

episodes.name: Hot Red Crack
episodes.overview: Six new couples are moving in together (having only met once!) and meeting the other Love Triangle participants at the first ever couple's party. This episode has everything: first kisses, explosive fights, and tantric sex.

episodes.name: Do You Trust Me?
episodes.overview: Patrick and Lisa take the other couples to task at a fiery couples’ party before the Love Triangle twist finally drops, turning the experience on its head and pushing new relationships to their limit. AND: Alex is the first to enter a love triangle.

episodes.name: Bombshell Day
episodes.overview: The six original singles are going on blind dates with the suitors they didn’t choose, while their chosen match stews at home. Red flags fly, new flames spark, and one of our singles ALREADY KNOWS their date.

episodes.name: Throuple Bullshit
episodes.overview: Just when you thought the Love Triangle twist was over… the final turn of the screw: the rejected suitors are MOVING IN with the original couples for the rest of the experience. Yikes.

episodes.name: Facts
episodes.overview: With the end of the experience just one week away, a shocking cheating scandal threatens to destroy one of Love Triangle's strongest couples.

episodes.name: Cinderella's Shoe
episodes.overview: The after-effects of the cheating scandal reverberate through the final days of the experience. Do our original singles want to pursue a relationship beyond the experience with either of their suitors, or un-match them both?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Love Triangle challenges a group of singles to relinquish their grasp on what they think their perfect partner should look like, and instead choose someone, sight unseen, based on a deeper connection.

episodes.name: All Or Nothing
episodes.overview: Six singles, fed up with looking for love on social media and dating apps, are choosing between two matches without any idea what they look like - until they meet IRL on a blind date. So, who'll catch feelings? And who'll snare a catfish?

episodes.name: DTF
episodes.overview: Three more singles join the Love Triangle experience. They've each been matched with two potential love interests and will choose one, sight unseen, based on three days of spicy, surprising texting.

episodes.name: Sleeping Arrangements
episodes.overview: Six brave singles are about to take a step into the unknown; moving in with someone they've only met once. So who'll share a bed, and who's destined to sleep alone?

episodes.name: It's Called Love Triangle For A Reason
episodes.overview: Week two of the experience brings deepening connections, and drama. Nellie reels from the revelation that Dan "slut shamed" her at last week's party and Jacinta & Nemo struggle with a very Gen Z problem

episodes.name: You're About to Meet the Super-Villain
episodes.overview: The supersized Love Triangle twist completely reshapes the experience, and a secret recording reveals an unthinkable secret.

episodes.name: Back in the Fun House
episodes.overview: Throuple life kicks into gear when the original suitors return to the experience after a week away and our Love Triangles begin living together. This episode has everything: break-ups, romance, scandalous secret recordings and one SHOCK departure.

episodes.name: Dog Act
episodes.overview: There's just one week left in the experience and all bets are off. This episode sees three shock departures, two surprising new connections, and tonnes of explosive drama as Sam is finally confronted about his secret girlfriend Hannah.

episodes.name: First Date Flashbacks
episodes.overview: The experience comes to an explosive, emotional conclusion. So, whose story has a happy ending? Who'll end up heartbroken? And most importantly - who's Hannah?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Love Triangle challenges a group of singles to relinquish their grasp on what they think their perfect partner should look like, and instead choose someone, sight unseen, based on a deeper connection.
